Title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen, Anthony Hines, Dan Swimer
Actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Maria Bakalova, Tom Hanks
Plot: Borat returns from Kazakhstan to America and this time he reveals more about the American culture, the COVID-19 pandemic and the political elections.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 38 wins & 64 nominations total
